lead_paragraph: Slater and Gordon, the first law firm to list on a stock exchange, plans to buy the professional services unit of the British firm for about $947 million.

headline.main: Slater and Gordon, Australian Law Firm, to Acquire Arm of Quindell of Britain

snippet: Slater and Gordon, the first law firm to list on a stock exchange, plans to buy the professional services unit of the British firm for about $947 million.
